document.full_text: the former boss of the new york-based bonanno crime family was found guilty of capital murder on monday for the 2004 slaying of a mafia associate.
document.title: mob boss "vinny gorgeous" found guilty of capital murder
lines_and_colors: the former boss of the new york-based bonanno crime family was found guilty of capital murder on monday for the 2004 slaying of a mafia associate.
